mapper.sql: id, student_no, test_no, choice, subjective, total, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into score (id, student_no, test_no, choice, subjective, total, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{choice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subjective,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into score
id,
student_no,
test_no,
choice,
subjective,
total,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update score
student_no = #{studentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
test_no = #{testNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
choice = #{choice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
subjective = #{subjective,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update score set student_no = #{studentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_no = #{testNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, choice = #{choice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subjective = #{subjective,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into score (student_no, test_no, total, create_time) values
( #{item.studentNo}, #{item.testNo}, #{item.total}, now() )
